Herb box is a reward from the Nightmare Zone, costing 9,500 reward points. It contains an assortment of ten random grimy herbs. Only 15 of these may be bought per day. Players can right-click a herb box to place all the herbs into a bank. Ironmen cannot purchase herb boxes.

Contents

  • 1 Possible loot
  • 2 Profit analysis
  • 3 Shop locations
  • 4 Changes

Possible loot[edit | edit source]

Item Quantity Rarity Price High Alch
Grimy guam leaf132/128497
Grimy marrentill124/128288
Grimy tarromin118/1281199
Grimy harralander114/1287579
Grimy ranarr weed111/1287,40918
Grimy irit leaf18/12875510
Grimy avantoe16/1282,18910
Grimy kwuarm15/1281,75412
Grimy cadantine14/1281,91113
Grimy lantadyme13/1281,60013
Grimy dwarf weed13/1281,09314

Profit analysis[edit | edit source]

Based on the percentages above, you can discern the approximate amount of profit you will make per box. Because prices are constantly fluctuating, the profit can vary, but it is highly unlikely that you will lose profit when buying herb boxes.

The estimated profit per box based off the percentages in the table is 10,948.91 coins, for a value of 1.15 coins per Nightmare Zone point.

Assuming that you open the highest number of herb boxes possible per day (which is 15) for 142,500 Nightmare Zone points, you may get a total average profit of 164,233.59 coins.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
5 March 2020
(update)

The opened variant's name was changed from "Opened herb box" to "Open herb box".

15 September 2016
(update)

The item was made members-only.
